lender.name: Gerry
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by my dog, Nala, who gives me her love and attention unconditionally every day.

lender.name: Baylor
lender.loan_because: I am trying to help others get a little bit of the luck I've had.
lender.occupational_info: I study the movement of water in the world's oceans.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: It just seems right.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank and make loans on behalf of the bank to businesses to allow them to buy other businesses.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I know this stuff works. Top-down foreign aid is a proven failure. Only bottom-up small enterprise and other local initiatives are the true path to sustained economic growth and a higher standard of living for people who have been without one for much too long.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: loans work.

lender.name: Marsha Woodbury
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Paul and Evan
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune; help others interested in helping themselves, their families and communities.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it is possible for me to help people in less fortunate circumstances than I find myself in.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 10 year olds (5th grade) in Southern California

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: The ease with which Kiva makes life changing contributions possible, it would be harder not to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Miami University of Ohio, studying Sociology and Economics.

lender.name: Robin & Neal
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people by giving them an opportunity to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching children who have reading difficulties or learning disabilities, and building commercial buildings

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: for very little effort from me I can make a big difference to someone else. Everyone should do this!

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: People need a little money to get started on any enterprise. This investment is a great way to feel I am part of the work, families, and happiness of people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to arrange campus events about Asia and to promote exchanges between our school and schools in Asia. I also look after foreigners on our campus.

lender.name: Shannan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and I am grateful for an opportunity to help people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells books, and I help libraries decide which books to buy.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: i like to help people in far away places
lender.occupational_info: it is cool because i am a student a hall middle school

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and literature in the U.S.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: People need assistance, and i hope by lending them what little I can I am able to make their hopes and dreams become a reality
lender.occupational_info: I am a highschool student, I do work at a Boy Scout camp over the summer but other than that i do not have a job

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky, and I think it is important to be respectful of all cultures, andgive back in a way that helps people all over the world

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a health psychologist who works with residents of skilled nursing facilities.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I study how cancer works.

lender.name: Kayvan
lender.loan_because: It provides people with opportunities and doesn't cost a cent!
lender.occupational_info: biologist

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe that with access to capital, millions of entrepreneurs around the world will be empowered to start and run successful businesses, greatly reducing world poverty

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe that some people just need someone to take a chance on them, because we are all capable of great things if we just have someone who believes in us.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Criminal Justice at The Pennsylvania State University.

lender.name: vivian
lender.loan_because: Want to encourage local economy.
lender.occupational_info: I give massages to private clients and also massage Los Alamos National Bank employees.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed in many ways. It's an opportunity to give back to my fellow citizens of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the art of creating finely designed and printed books reflecting craftsmanship and artistic expression.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I have some money to spare.
lender.occupational_info: Carpenter on large buildings.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: when capital meets a worthy need, great things happen

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I want to help other business people get started.
lender.occupational_info: Starting up a micro-philanthropy website.

lender.name: Abbie
lender.loan_because: We are called to help our brothers

lender.name: Jo-G and L-No
lender.loan_because: We started in high school with $100 and four loans--now we have made 22 loans using the same money over and over! This is great!
lender.occupational_info: We're in college.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work in recycling

lender.name: ROY
lender.occupational_info: I help find better treatments for diseases.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to do something small to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Hank
lender.loan_because: I was tired of charities that eat up donations in salaries and overhead. Kiva seems to be a very efficient and effective way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former newspaper reporter and editor.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with women who have become lost to themselves in the fog of addiction.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance
lender.occupational_info: Exciting and challenging, I love to watch a start up business grow.

lender.name: Marlon
lender.occupational_info: I work to better the City of New York.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life in numerous ways. We are blessed to be a blessing. Thus, I want to share my financial blessings with others who are striving to make their way, to support themselves and their families and raising their own, and their community's, standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations that want to become markedly better in all aspects of their endeavors. I both teach and coach how to implement Lean Systems Thinking, which is modeled after the Toyota Production System. The main objective is a total transformation of the business model into one of "product" flow, inclusiveness, transparency, respect for every person, and much greater profitability and/or system effectiveness so as to assure the future of the organization.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: You can gamble in the stock market or you can try and help someone. The amount I have given to Kiva is so small compared to the amount that has been wasted so many other places. And the money just keeps getting recycled, it is really a joy.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: just a tiny payback to the Lord for taking such good care of our family.
lender.occupational_info: Jail nurse.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: ...my small contribution can one day change lives. Loaning gives me the chance to show love and peace to a brother or sister in another part of the world.

lender.name: Shane and Trish
lender.loan_because: Life's been good to me, lending makes me feel good, and hopefully it'll help make the world a better place. When I first read about Kiva I found the idea brilliant and wanted to participate. This is the way it should be done.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a marketing analyst/consultant in the insurance industry. My wife writes books, articles and edits for a living.

lender.name: Andrew & Sarah
lender.loan_because: "Do not commit the error, common among the young, of assuming that if you cannot save the whole of mankind, you have failed." -Jan de Hartog, playwright and novelist (1914-2002)
lender.occupational_info: "In a completely rational society, the best of us would be teachers and the rest of us would have to settle for something less, because passing civilization along from one generation to the next ought to be the highest honor and the highest responsibility anyone could have." -Lee Iacocca, automobile executive (1924- )

lender.name: Jeff and Gilberto
lender.loan_because: We believe in the limitless power of the unbridled human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: A married gay interracial couple, both of us are professional fund-raisers for non-profit civil rights and civil liberties organizations.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I believe this is something that actually works!
lender.occupational_info: I study a lot...and basically have no life.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to give others in my country a headstart.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure my clients use the tools they have effectively.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit loans are a great way to make a difference, and with Muhammad Yunus winning a Nobel Prize, and Nicholas Kristof writing about Kiva in his New York Times column, it seems very reputable. I am amazed that you can make an impact in someone's life as simply as this.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in wisdom and values, and try to help provide access to ideas that can improve people's lives.

lender.name: Sidney
lender.loan_because: I think Mohammed Yunus is a genius. I am amazed and thrilled by how well his microcredit network has worked and how it has changed the lives of so many people, mainly women (and by extension, their families.) This type of aid is very satisfying because it helps people help themselves and become self-sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an assistant professor at the University of California San Diego. I am a doctor who anesthetizes children and adults; I also teach residents and medical students.

lender.name: Jacque
lender.loan_because: Giving back to the world is actually how we ever really receive.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help creative and resourceful people

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I read Nick Kristof's column today, and that combined with my limited knowledge of microfinance and respect for Dr. Yunus' initiative in Bangladesh made me spontaneously create this profile.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Tufts University majoring in international relations with a focus on economic development. I enjoy reading, opera, and scuba diving, and my hero is Thomas Friedman.

lender.name: Bud,Jeanne & Gram
lender.loan_because: We are able to share. Along with our Mom, we hope to make things better. We admire those with the guts and determination to take a risk to improve their situation
lender.occupational_info: We are retired school personnel. We want to give back and help those who are seeking to better themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I want to give the poor the chance to live the life that we live.
lender.occupational_info: Doing God's work!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to grow up with a wonderful family that taught me the value of honesty, sincerety, and being good to others. Living in one of the richest country's in the world, the least I can do is to help someone share in that.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Simply, because it is nothing but a privledge. We can harness the power of business to do good for all!
lender.occupational_info: I work in international development. The foundation I work for focuses on aid through trade.

lender.name: Perry
lender.loan_because: such a small amount can make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Promoting fun and non-violent conflict resolution skills through baseball to children and adults all over the world.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Thinking small is a great way to begin charity at home. I hope to one day visit one or more of my business partners.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the local medical school.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: it empowers others.
lender.occupational_info: i develop, cast and produce shows, mostly musicals.

lender.name: Blaire
lender.loan_because: Having lived in Nigeria, I know first-hand how powerful a small amount of money can be in the third world. This is nothing short of mass cultivation of the entrepreneurial spirit. Let's hope its growth is exponential!
lender.occupational_info: In my day job, I help customers manage their documents. I am a gemology student. I manufacture and sell jewelry. I sing in an a' cappella quartet.

lender.name: alex
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: doing research in medical policy

lender.name: brooklynny
lender.loan_because: it is an incredible opportunity

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: make tools for the internet.

lender.name: Venu
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute my part in uplifting the poor and making the world a better place to live in.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: We are so spectaculary fortunate financially in the world and with such little we can mean so much to others around the world. It makes me feel good to contribute to others and with Kiva it is not only giving but empowering someone else to create more for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Web developer, business owner and jewelry designer. www.JuicyJewelry.com, www.WorldTravelShop.com & www.Infotask.com

lender.name: Jeff &Laura
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help others and we wanted to share this amazing experience with the guests at our wedding. These loans are in their honor.

lender.name: irene
lender.loan_because: a simple small amount yet can make such a great improvement in others people lives living in another part of this world. The world without strangers!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: An open hand is so much richer than a closed fist.
lender.occupational_info: I breathe with attention. I teach others to listen and to breathe with mindfulness.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-credit loans in helping to alleviate poverty!

lender.name: Kamael
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to connect with the most inspiring visionaries and leaders of tomorrow's world.
lender.occupational_info: I started a non profit focused on using mobile technology to help the ultra poor around the world.

lender.name: Isaacs
lender.occupational_info: I compose electronic music ( www.myspace.com/xanrecordings ) and do interaction design for the web.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: This is a simple way that I can change people's lives for the better.

lender.name: Ina and Irwin
lender.loan_because: I started my business with the equivalent of a micro loan and made a success of it. We understand the power of such a loan. We want others to have the same opportunity.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: Planting Seeds
lender.occupational_info: Providing service to the public by assisting them in understanding and remaining in compliance with government tax laws and filing requirements.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I write

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Traveling the world as much as I do helps me to see -first hand- the importance of helping people accomplish dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My work finds me responsible for the safety and comfort of my passengers. Since many passengers are affraid to fly and some have had unhappy experiences on an airplane, my job is to ease their discomfort. I also want to make sure that the passengers who travel on my airplane arrive at their destination safely and looking forward to flying with us again.

lender.name: Lily Ng Eng Eng
lender.loan_because: I would like to support KIVA!

lender.name: The Fernie-Walsh Family
lender.loan_because: Small business is the engine that runs the world.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to transfer funds to most parts of the developing world. Whereas the financially established can usually obtain funding for large projects, people with good but modest ideas seem to have difficulty getting even minimal seed money. That's why I think microlending is a brilliant idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a historian and I teach students from age 15-19 in an international school. Although I am trained in European history, my interest has turned to world history and the many connections that have been fostered between differing cultures over time, and how people, in the bast case, learn from each other. My interest coincides with the backgrounds of my students. In my school it is not uncommon to have students from between 50-60 different countries.

lender.name: Fadlun
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life with a comfortable life although am not rich.I hold the belief that it is better to teach someone to fish rather than give the fish. I see this as my small contribution towards that end and am glad to see that the money goes to the person that I intended to help without having to go through so many red tapes where you never know whether the money reach the person you intended it for.
lender.occupational_info: Sitting at the desk reading and vetting documents. Can be boring sometime and wished I hold some exciting job or be able to volunteer to Kiva to visit the entrepeneurs but need to work to feed the family and pay off debts.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: i can and i care.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: It gives people the tools to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the California Environmental Protection Agency.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: We are a very rich country that needs to continuously do more for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student.

lender.name: wolverdick
lender.loan_because: For so many, just a small opportunity is all they need.

lender.name: Eline
lender.loan_because: I want to enable other people to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a franchising company.

lender.name: creatini
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love to help people that they can develop they business to have a better life and to make a difference.

lender.name: Stephane
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and this seems like a better way to help than an outright grant. Hopefully I'll put up more money in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I write about business for a magazine.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: it's a good idea. A low-overhead loan network helping small businesses around the world is one thing that the world really needs!
lender.occupational_info: retired professor of Russian and one who worked many years in Academic Computing.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: We take so much for granted. Even a small loan which is so little to us means a great deal to people in need of financial resources opening doors to opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I was born in Michigan, live in Italy and am married with two children.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to feel that my donations serve individuals very directly and provide them an incentive to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Much of my work was helping governments and businesses in developing countries understand and work with international trade rules and negotiations.

lender.name: canan
lender.loan_because: I belive everyone deserves a chance to achieve some good things in their lives and children s lives.kiva is an amazing idea for this. have really excited when had read about kiva in a newspaper.all of us need other people every second in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: work for a construction company

lender.name: Jakob
lender.loan_because: I am able to and I like the way micro loans work.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a MS in electrical engineering.

lender.name: Uffe
lender.loan_because: I am able to

lender.name: Rama and Sim
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of entrepreneurship, the importance of working for yourself especially in Africa where we are from.

lender.name: Jen & Casey
lender.loan_because: What could be better than to help people help themselves?

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the bottom-up approach to development aid. People on the ground know better about what needs to be done.

lender.name: Worth
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way I have heard of to help people who are able to work and have spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I worked as a lawyer handling trials of injured persons against companies.

lender.name: Lian
lender.loan_because: I think it will be interesting and inspiring to see the progress of small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying history and theory of architecture. I have just under a year left in my degree program (PhD).

lender.name: Matthias BERAHYA-LAZARUS
lender.loan_because:
I strongly believe in both entrepreneurship and micro-lending. Politicians -- especially in France -- tend to believe that 'development' or 'growth' can be forecast or self-declared... they are sadly mistaken.
Growth comes from the will and work of courageous men & women, called entrepreneurs, who decide to invest money and start/run/develop a new business.
I hope the money I'll provide will help generating wealth troughout the world!
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as CEO of a new venture called Bonial, allowing users to search through local offer, brochures and catalogues on the web or on their smartphone.

lender.name: The Wizners
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. We hope to raise children who understand how to give, to lend, to share.
lender.occupational_info: teachers, parents, readers, writers

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get a good thing started -- banks rarely loan on a great idea and a promise to work hard!
lender.occupational_info: I have retired and now volunteer for Crossroads International. We provide quality, needed items to people around the world.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it seems like a direct, tangible way of helping people improve their lives.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I think that this is a great way to help the people with the most need. Seeing their pictures and knowing what they need the money for makes it more personal.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired living on a modest income, but I realise that I would seem rich to people in some areas, so I give what I can afford.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I like to help those that help themselves

lender.name: josh
lender.loan_because: maybe you folks are on to something
lender.occupational_info: I like to make things

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is justice to help others and it makes me feel good.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It's nice to see that one person can make a difference a little bit at a time

lender.name: Drew and daughter Molly
lender.loan_because: This is the best form of foreign aid. It is a privilege to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I make my living buying seed from wholesale suppliers and reselling it to retail buyers.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: The chain of helping people help themselves is stronger by the acts of giving and enabling those who are helped to assist someone else. Giving hope is priceless.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who love what they do. I use my computer and writing skills to give them a website that meets their needs for a price they can afford.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It seems like a cool idea
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy at a university.

lender.name: Atticus
lender.loan_because: I was an exchange student in Uganda many years ago and would like to help give back to the many people who extended their hospitality to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work with local governments and school districts with their public finance matters.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: No one asked to be born into poverty and we should all support those willing to work their way up.
lender.occupational_info: I just finished 1 amazing year in Afghanistan.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: other people will have a shot for better life.

lender.name: Meta
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power and empowerment of the individual.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and I am a student of geography and environmental science.

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: Jehovah is my God, Christ is my saviour and the Holy Spirit is Love!

lender.name: kimberly
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to have the resources.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to high school students of an online digital school!

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: It's more rewarding than another trip to the mall.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computers how to read English.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I read about the extraordinary Muhammad Yunus, Nobel Peace Prize Winner, and his micro credit bank and this all made sense to me. Then I read Nicholas Kristoff's great column in the New York Times about KIVA and micro credit and I knew I had to get involved.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired now and enjoying it some, but I remain troubled that there is so much unnecessary poverty in the world. Yunus has me convinced it is not necessary.

lender.name: Tinman
lender.occupational_info: I organize books and web sites so people can find information they need.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans are an effective way to assist people in achieving better lives.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: In this world of craziness, corruption and cynicism, Kiva reminds me that we all can make an impact on another person's life in a very real way.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the medical profession.

lender.name: Talibah
lender.loan_because: as a small business owner, I know how hard it is to raise even small bits of capital to maintain and expand a business. I would like to help others using their businessess to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: My work is fun and rewarding, even if often solitary. When I do it well, and I try my best to do it well all the time, my work helps people to learn, grow and solve problems.

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: maryellen
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: The human family is dysfunctional, with some members having 1000s of times as much money and resources as others. Very unhealthy state of affairs.
lender.occupational_info: I promote wind power in the USA. It is sustainable and clean and doesn't use water or add to global warming.

lender.name: Cicely
lender.loan_because: Everyone has needed a "leg up." I am just glad that I am in a position to offer a small, but positive step towards the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have speech/ language disabilities. I currently work with many children who have autism.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want us all to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that people are safe and comfortable during their surgery.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info:
My work is like being a librarian for old photographs and documents. You can see a selection from our collections at
www.flickr.com/photos/medicalmuseum, or at the link below.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: "Samsara"

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together ... one world
lender.occupational_info: organizational psychologist .

lender.name: Bill Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I believe in this program and enjoy watching progress being made.
lender.occupational_info: I am an acting teacher and a playwright. I sometimes work as an actor and voice talent.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union and have seen the needs of these industrious people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired University Professor who spent the last 12 years of my work teaching in many foreign countries, among them Azerbaijan, the Republic of Georgia, Poland and South Africa.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: this is such an efficient way to help people. And the people-to-people connection between lender and the one receiving the loan is very special.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work now. I did work for our government for many years.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It's a great thing to do and helps someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build custom furniture with woods from around the world.

lender.name: ufei
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: joan
lender.loan_because: the need to help other people less fortunate is great and rewarding in a personal way
lender.occupational_info: INTERESTING

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: maybe things don't have to fall apart. Let this be a center that holds.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: The need is obvious and the satisfaction is great.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Government professional.

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: a few folks joining to give a little money help a lot of hard-working people
lender.occupational_info: oil and gas exploration

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Piano Teacher

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: It is so easy. With a few clicks on our keyboards, we become connected to a new friend with a good business idea. It is touching how diligently the business women pay back their loans. My goal is add a new Kiva relationship a month.
lender.occupational_info: I help figure out new ways for computers to help our company's business people. I help design what the new software can do and then help people use it. It's fun!

lender.name: Roger & Dee
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime." - Author unknown
lender.occupational_info: Human Resources for a major US corporation

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I admire hard-working people who do everything they can to be independent and help themselves.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I think Microfinance is a good idea to help people. Only $25, you can help someone to make his own living. why not?

lender.name: Mazie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others build better lives, especially through sustainable agriculture.

lender.name: pat & dave
lender.loan_because: we are able to.
lender.occupational_info: university staff

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: The world belongs to everyone and I belong to the world
lender.occupational_info: stay at home Dad/part time salesman

lender.name: Sally & Phil
lender.loan_because: although we are not Bill Gates, we too, want to help. KIVA makes it possible.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired. This frees me to do volunteer work in our church. My husband runs science labs in the local community college.

lender.name: Donald & Lilly
lender.loan_because: We work for ourselves and we think this is a great way to help fellow capitalists. Owning your own successful business and helping others is a great gift to your community
lender.occupational_info: We service all kinds of watches. Make parts, Complete restorations

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva's lending concept is something that I have not seen before. It rewards those who take risks and work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software programs for a local government in South Florida.

lender.name: Jim and Joey
lender.loan_because: I was once a small business owner and appreciate the special energy and commitment an entrepreneur brings to his work.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I like the dignity of lending to a person who may shun charity but just needs a chance. I have been given so many opportunities in my life. I also want the world to know that I am for World Peace. No wars !!
lender.occupational_info: I counsel children and adults to help them feel better.

lender.name: Jean & Gerry
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is a wonderful thing.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: watching an entrepreneur do something productive with a few dollars of mine is more interesting than letting it sit in the bank.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to help people operate their own business.

lender.name: Teoh LayGhee Foundation
lender.loan_because: business will make a difference in contribution financially to their family
lender.occupational_info: being God's servant to help others whenever I can

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to be successful, happy and provide for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I don't really need this little bit of money, but they do. It's also nice to donate to a person, and not a corporate edifice.
lender.occupational_info: I study the ecology and behavior of fishes in river ecosystems.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I'm learning about helping others.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: Mi fa piacere aiutare chi ha bisogno
lender.occupational_info: Commercio

lender.name: paola e monica
lender.loan_because: we can do

lender.name: Sarah and Mark
lender.loan_because: We got engaged while visiting and working in Ghana, and made a commitment to helping others as part of our life together. We asked friends and family to join us in lending, in lieu of wedding gifts.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is a trustworthy and meaningful way to foster international development, without fears that funds will be misapplied or wasted.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government agency.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Although I have been doing this for years on my own (Kenya mainly), Kiva seems to have the system down pat. There is honor in helping, there is dignity in succeeding. There is a better world when both are symbiotic.
lender.occupational_info: I help authors find publishers who will print and sell their books.

lender.name: Lisa & Steve
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: curious people who love books and travel

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can't do everything, but I can do something.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I loan because it works, I've been doing this for several years and I think have made a difference in people's lives. It's a good feeling.

lender.name: GCF Fund
lender.loan_because: I represent a group of friends who have decided to pool their money to help folks not just at the holidays but all year round. Kiva is a perfect place to acheive this goal.
lender.occupational_info: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world: indeed, it is the only thing that ever does.- Margaret Mead

lender.name: Ivano
lender.loan_because: I think a chance is ......life!!!

lender.name: nadine
lender.occupational_info: software

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are good for the world, and they require funds to work.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a designer at a gaming company. I also have a couple small businesses of my own, including a custom bookplates website, and an invention called the TopoCover.

lender.name: Eric & Gretchen
lender.loan_because: what is a small amount of money to us can change someone else's future.

lender.name: Fang
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to encourage economic development.
lender.occupational_info: I am a PhD student in labor and development economics. My research involves education and labor issues in developing countries, especially India and China.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to share some of my resources with others across the world who simply need a bit of support to make better lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: For 20 years I worked in non profit fund raising and communications for a U.S. charity. In May, 2010, after three grueling years of law school, I earned a Juris Doctorate. Currently, I work as an international tour operator, helping build bridges of understanding through travel.

lender.name: Wallis
lender.occupation: Consultant to the clinical research industry

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: It is one small thing I can do to help out someone who is trying to get ahead in the world and is not supported by big business. I think this small action can give someone a helping hand and make a big difference in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an instructor in the Department of Kinesiology at Kansas State University. I specialize in Cardiopulmonary physiology and will have my PhD in 2009 or 2010.

lender.name: Greg S.
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. And I believe at least in this case, a loan can do more than a gift. This is something anyone can do and everyone should do.
lender.occupational_info: Attorney

lender.name: Glen Galindo
lender.loan_because: People who work hard and contribute to their community should be supported.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying how to manage globalization of higher education. Everything dealing with student study-abroad programs, faculty exchange and multi-national campus development.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe helping people who already have an idea about how to improve their lot is the best way to improve their lives, leave them in charge.
lender.occupational_info: I now volunteer in the financial management of my church.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: It is in giving that we receive. It is as simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve personal legal problems.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It empowers people to do what they dream of doing.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that is trying to rehabilitate abandoned gas stations and turn them in to community centers and green spaces.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it's so easy, it'd be a crime not to.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the marketing department of a security technology company.

lender.name: Kathy and Yvonne
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want people to be as happy as we are and to have the same opportunities in life with which we have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Kathy works at a University, and Yvonne is a massage therapist. and writer.

lender.name: Jon, Ann, Lucy, & Rosie
lender.loan_because: Our involvement with InterVarsity Christian Fellowship's "Open for Business" conference in 2006 convinced us of the power of business to be part of God's redeeming influence in the world.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It is congruent with my heart, mind and soul.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering youth and teachers to make a meaningful contribution to the health and welfare of people and the planet. See: www.iearn.org

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people in areas we can't get to ourselves for volunteer work. And I like that it's a loan, not charity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to speak professionally to groups of other people in a way that gives them credibility and confidence.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: Funding business partners around the world seems like a better use of money than buying more useless consumer goods.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company, collecting requirements from customers and turning those into product specifications that our developers work from. In my spare time, I ride my bike as fast as possible.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I am interested in the internet as a force for change.
lender.occupational_info: I teach english and computer and media studies at a public university.

lender.name: kristen
lender.loan_because: What is a small thing for me to give can be a big thing to the one who receives, with ripples that flow out to families and communities. Thanks to Kiva for making it easy!

lender.name: NaturalMagic
lender.loan_because: I put my money where my mouth is.
lender.occupational_info: I teach.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: It is an easy, productive and empowering way to fight poverty.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I have seen micro-loans work, and I believe they are suitable instruments for empowering the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant and have worked on development issues in over 70 countries

lender.name: Cho
lender.loan_because:
I really believe that microfinancing is the best way possible to alleviating proverty. It gives them a chance to become self-sufficient without waiting on charity.
Hopefully the organization you get the loans from also teach you business strategies too.
lender.occupational_info: I assist lawyers with work.

lender.name: Jimmy Dunne
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people get out of poverty by starting or expanding a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to abolish corporal punishment in schools through People Opposed to Paddling Students or POPS in Houston

lender.name: Mary McKay
lender.loan_because: because I am delighted to find a way to make a difference in people's lives. It's wonderful to be able to watch the successes of the recipients of the loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and a painter.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in their struggles.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney that represents those who cannot afford to hire an attorney when they are accused by the government of wrong doing.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I have been given much and in my retirement I am giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer with Habitat for Humanity, Hospice of the Carolina Foothills, Polk County Resource Council, Thermal Belt Friendship Council. For some of the above I have a resposible position, for others I do a lot of their "crud" work, (mailouts, errands, etc.), all of which I enjoy and which keeps me "young" in spirit. I am in my 80th year.

lender.name: Babs & Richie
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to help make dreams come true.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I teach design; studying to teach math.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: it helps me to feel I'm making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Currently my job is that of caring for my children, thankfully mothering is a universal language.

lender.name: Joe Paris
lender.loan_because: How can i NOT loan? In our beautiful, abundant world, we must all interdepend upon one another to live well. I loan because I am able to right now, and don't wish to miss this chance to help someone when I can.
lender.occupational_info: Telling stories to children of all ages is my passion. I visit schools, hospitals, fairs & festivals, families, and anywhere people gather to share stories by LISTENING TO as well as telling stories that are important to folks.

lender.name: Maurice
lender.loan_because: It is an expression of my religion's highest form of supporting others. I am Jewish, and in my tradition the most noble form of supporting others is to provide someone with a loan or other resources so that they can achieve economic independence.
lender.occupational_info: I am a rabbi at a Jewish congregation in the state of Oregon in the U.S.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: this method seems to allow individuals an opportunity that otherwise is unavailable through regular financial sources. It makes sense to me!

lender.name: kirsten
lender.loan_because: this is simply an amazing idea. everyone should do it. redistributing wealth and involving people from all over the world has answered some of my nagging questions of the unfairness of poverty and an accessible way to help remedy the problem. meaningful, EASY involvement with people from all over the world is yet another reason the world wide web makes me smile.

lender.name: Augie and Trena
lender.loan_because: All people, children of God, have a right to basic necessities: food, water, shelter, education, healthcare.
lender.occupational_info: Augie is a Campus Minister at a Catholic high school. Trena cares for our two sons and daughter at home.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to empower business owners, give dignity to individuals and communicate God's love for them in a practical way.
lender.occupational_info: I own my own small business that provides accounting and bookkeeping services. I am also a pastor at a Christian church. I believe Jesus loves every human being on Earth and I want to share that love with those I help.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed in my life and I want to give something back

lender.name: Marin
lender.occupational_info: I research brain development in children using MRI pictures of their brains.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: My daughter Christina volunteered with "Village Enterprise Fund" in East Africa and showed me first hand the needs of the very poor and their desire to creatively help themselves.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to recycle one's money by investing in another's future. Becoming a part of another's success is a reward beyond the money.
lender.occupational_info: During my employment years I managed engineers who made equipment operate in a manufacturing business. Today I make furniture, ride a bicycle long distances, volunteer helping children who are at risk.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to leave the world better than I found it
lender.occupational_info: Using the financial markets to manage risk

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: Humanitarian, Environmental, Lodging, Investment, etc.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: This makes so much sense and a modest amount can mean so much to someone. This is a wonderful idea.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher in Denver, Colorado, USA. I teach refugee children from all over the world to read English. I love my job and my students.

lender.name: Nhat
lender.loan_because: I have profound respect for people who are willing to take responsibility for their own lives but need just a little help toward self-sustenance.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Giving to Kiva is one of the easiest and most effective ways to help others achieve self sufficiency.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: Joining the kiva community is a way of being connected to people in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: long-term Canadian civil servant - now retired.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school social studies in new york.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help women entrepreneurs, especially those involved in quilting and the fiber arts.
lender.occupational_info: I write books, and also write for magazines, websitesm and businesses.

lender.name: Terrie
lender.loan_because: my children have never gone hungry. Kiva is a great way to offer direct help to people who are struggling with the day to day problems that come with poverty. It helps me express my gratitude.
lender.occupational_info: I do office work for non-profit land trust and I do a lot of work with and for my church,

lender.name: Anupam
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Systems Engineering is what you get when you mix a lot of science and expertise with a bit of 'autmagik'!

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help others help themselves and, with any luck, those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate the paperwork for commercial transactions (mostly involving the transfer of business loans between lenders).

lender.name: Randy
lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher and network operations architect in my day job. I have spent my spare time in the last 20 years bringing the internet to academics in the poorest countries.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: Presently with more money than I need and having lived at various stages of wealth, I understand that encouragement, economic or otherwise, goes a long way when combined with initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an editor and writer, most recently in the book publishing industry. On good days I use more than just my head.

lender.name: AlzheimersScreen.com
lender.loan_because: , as Ken Kesey said, "Put your good where it will do the most".
lender.occupational_info: Automated touch screen tests for cognitive changes that predict Alzheimer's disease.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: empowering people to provide for themselves and their communities is the most important and sustainable aid I as an idividual can provide.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional orchestral clarinetist! My job is to rehearse and perform incredible pieces of music. You can't beat that.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have been on medical missions and have seen the need of people first hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am an obstetrician employed by a large regional medical center. Our group of 4 takes care of pregnant women who are uninsured, illegal, poor, etc. who present to the hospital in labor. We also run a free clinic.

lender.name: Dinny
lender.loan_because: After reading Hillary Clinton's Autobiography I was very interested in Micro-loans. Borrowing a little of our money is so valuable in these economies, to these individuals. Nicholas Kristof's column in the NYT made it real.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked with animals for my whole life; everything from owning a goat dairy to training hunting dogs,wolves and dressage horses. I teach people to be in sync with the critters that share our lives, In other words I'm an animal trainer (people trainer).

lender.name: Sol
lender.loan_because: Microlending is the quintessential example of globalization and capitalism's "good side". Because it relies on individual achievement and self-help, it is to me enormously fascinating and rewarding.

lender.name: Sai & Kalyan
lender.loan_because: I want to extend a helping hand to those who are less fortunate than I am and because I hope someday those I help will themselves be in a position to help others.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: This started as a student project at BYU-Idaho 3 years ago. But I think Kiva is great and I am proud to be a member.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college graduate with a B.A. in Art History.

lender.name: Lou & Debra
lender.loan_because: Debra and I have been blessed with many things. We wish to help others so that one day they too can achieve their hopes and dreams.

lender.name: Ray Iannicelli
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bill & Marielle
lender.loan_because: Lending allows hard working people to retain their self respect by being able to re pay the loan.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because:
I want to help. These people have business ideas and are willing to work hard and the only obstacle is a small amount of cash. I love the idea that these small businesses give back to their communities through services they provide and - more importantly - through creating jobs.
In my line of work I read a lot about macroeconomic conditions in developing countries, World Bank initiatives, etc, but I believe that a grass roots campaign like Kiva's and simple microfinance is crucial in helping people break away from poverty.
I admire courage and commitment of all people with entrapreneurial spirit, but helping SMALL entrapreneurs AND in poor countries has almost transcendental dimension. I guess, ultimately, it is self gratifying....
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small brokerage firm as an emerging markets analyst.

lender.name: Agilitas
lender.loan_because: I wish to practice the love of Christ and help humanity as long as I exist.
lender.occupational_info: I am an owner of a software product and consulting firm.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I respect the entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising sales for WKRN-TV/ News 2 in Nashville, TN

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I know a little bit of capital will unlock creative entrepreneurial spirit and muster resources in profound ways that will quickly improve lives.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for National Public Radio service.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are not as fortunate as I am and help to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an administrative assistant supporting four bankers in a financial services institution in New York City.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I've achieved many things in my life with the support of others, and having worked in Africa realize how little opportunity there is for assistance of this kind.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the communications team for an international public health organization.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea and a great opportunity for all of us. So lets see, if it works.
lender.occupational_info: Im a teacher in a vocational school in Munich, Germany. My subjects are Protestant Religion and Technical English.

lender.name: Linsey
lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts!

lender.name: William and Gaylan
lender.loan_because: We believe in investing in people...and everyone needs help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a corporate Dilbert in a cubicle.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism, and I admire people who have the courage to start their own business. I respect people who work hard to support their family............... Voluntary private help is more efficient & less corrupt than "foreign aid." Forget the UN and IMF -- we can help each other without them.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It works! A microloan to an enterprising person enables them to better their own situation and that of their community. It confers a level of dignity that a donation does not.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving while helping others less fortunate than I.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-loans can change lives by empowering others to effect the change through their the borrower's own work and entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites and applications for a nonprofit organization that provides practical training opportunities in the United States for foreign students and young professionals.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: The Garapicks
lender.loan_because: We want to help others.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I've been luckier than most
lender.occupational_info: I make investments in companies and take care of my children

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I've been very lucky to have been born here in the United States, with a loving family and great opportunities that I've never taken for granted. I give because I want others have to the same chance to improve their lives, support their families, and follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, much like the one you are looking at right now. I choose the colors, fonts, and the layout that I hope will look pleasing to the eye, as well as properly showing the information. I also write and perform music.

lender.name: Myron
lender.loan_because: I have received help from others and want to see others get the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I build houses and rent them.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because:
I was first inspired and moved by two people - one is Muhammad Yunus who most of you'll be familiar with and the second is Greg Mortenson.
I wonder how I can give something back. It is a great feeling to get rid of that cash - it's almost like a liberation to give such a small amount to someone for whom it makes such a big difference.
As lenders we need to network and work together to make sure that this goes beyond lending money. Even as Muhammad Yunus said - that charity denies people dignity - so we need to get together and start taking this to the next level - give a man a fish or teach him to fish...
gbrown@w2forum.com
lender.occupational_info: Telecoms & Real Estate. But that's only given me the chance to make a difference. The real work starts by giving all that back to others...

lender.name: JIM
lender.loan_because: During my lifetime of 78 years, so far, I have worked at many jobs from iron miner, trench digger, welder, business manager and attorney. I received help along the way from many good people and now that I am retired I keep busy buying and selling items and educational e-books on ebay. You can see an example of an e-book on my website and i will send it free to any Kiva borrower who wishes to start a similar business. I will be using the ebay profits to make loans to people thru Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from my practice of law where I helped clients in business, and family issues.

lender.name: Abe Louise
lender.loan_because: it is thrilling. Solidarity, not charity!
lender.occupational_info: Writing for a better world, inside my heart and outside my front door. Educating teenagers around the globe!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an accountant for a very well-known hospital/university. I LOVE my job, but my true passion is animals--I'm presently a foster home for newly rescued former racing Greyhounds. Race cars, not dogs!!

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and I know how fortunate I am that I can make these loans

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Kiva's system makes so much sense, is easy to use, and it is one way to repay what I have gained from the generosity of others.
lender.occupational_info: Editing historical documents for publication

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: current development models are stale, its time for innovation, creativity, and giving more trust to people in developing countries to lead development programming in their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: I have been involved in global health research and analysis since I was a PCV in Mali, from 2000-2002. Although my focus is on water/sanitation issues, health like all other development issues, are interconnected with better outcomes for other parts of an individual's life.

lender.name: Loren and Mistie
lender.loan_because: We want to help

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by entrepreneurs in developing countries!

lender.name: dede & marko
lender.loan_because: we're delighted to have found this creative way to give back and to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: It's such a small thing for me to do that gets big results for others.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in many ways. I think the loans I make through Kiva is one good way to share my blessings with others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Although retired, I still am active as an Episcopal priest. I sometimes lead worship and preach. I often consult with leaders of congregations to help them with challenges in their community's life. Beyond that, I frequently get involved in local political issues, trying to make our city a better place for all its citizens. My wife and I also try to spend time with our nine grandchildren, and we like to travel to distant places and see things and meet people different from those at home.

lender.name: syndallas
lender.loan_because: I want to increase kindness, love, and peace in the world. I see people with such great ideas and I want to see them happen!
lender.occupational_info: I care for my two sons, husband and home. I teach science at my son's school.

lender.name: Mike & Bridget
lender.loan_because: the opportunity to earn an economic living is the greatest equalizer in our world.

lender.name: Shenkiat
lender.loan_because: You gotta do what you gotta do.

lender.name: Marvin
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be able make a difference in another persons life.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think that Kiva is a brilliant idea. I believe that given a chance people can, and will do the most amazing things.

lender.name: Kazel
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to have all that I have in my life, and I want to give back for that. I want to help others who haven't been so lucky. Kiva is one good way. It is such a great opportunity to reach out to other people and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English at a community college in Austin. I teach composition and literature classes to about 150 students a semester. It's a great job!

lender.name: Nathanael
lender.loan_because: This is an incredible idea and I want to be a part of it.

lender.name: Suzy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who will help themselvs
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and I know that beyond "enough," having more brings no happiness. Sharing does.

lender.name: marian
lender.loan_because: i want to do my part to help my fellow man/woman. i wouldnt be where i am without the help of kind strangers. i am returning the favor.
lender.occupational_info: healthcare field

lender.name: Dana& Hugh
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to support themselves and their family.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am truly inspired by the stories and dedication of the entrepreneurs I see on KIVA. I hope that what I am able to share does make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Linda Sue
lender.loan_because: small acts of grace put together are so much more powerful than giant corporation and foundations can ever be.
lender.occupational_info: I work for executives managing the details of their lives; in my "real" life, I am a wife, pet owner and actor.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Making a connection with the world : )

lender.name: bart
lender.loan_because: I care and giving to someone who is trying to lift themselves up feels good and feels right. I truly wish these people the best. If my contribution has even a small positive impact on one life it is worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I design networks that transport data, voice and video.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I have gone back to university after working for 32 years in health care. I feel richly blessed and think that we should all help each other so there is no more war!!

lender.name: Philip/Thelma
lender.loan_because: having lived overseas, we know how much small gifts can do to make for large results in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We now volunteer our services to our local library, and we work at being good grandparents.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I grew a business as a single mom, and I know how much it would have mattered to have financial help
lender.occupational_info: My company sews custom draperies and other items for interior designers

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I know micro-credit works to help people otherwise unable to get credit achieve their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for local government and volunteer for several local non-profits related to land protection, sustainability and supporting at risk children

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: It's completely unacceptable to be living so well in the US and not give back to others. I like the idea of helping others who are trying their best to make ends meet. This is a great program!
lender.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher, which means I work with children who may need a little more help to learn something new. I enjoy my job because the children are adorable and I can be creative.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I've got money coming out of my ears. It's actually kinda gross, and sometimes I can't hear very well with all of it crammed in there. Don't worry, though - I wash off the ear wax before I lend it.

lender.name: Mei
lender.loan_because: I think Microfinancing is the most sustainable way to improve the world and fight poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies improve efficiencies and keep cost down in their supply chain.

lender.name: Chico SML
lender.loan_because: We want to end poverty around the world and we believe that micro-lending is the best tool for this. We are working for a world free of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Students For Micro-Lending is an organization on the Chico State campus. We are fundraising in order to make micro-loans to people in need around the world.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe it is my responsibility to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Preserve the built environment worth saving, and design new places of beauty and significance.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be better off than the people who need the loans.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Patricia & Wayne
lender.loan_because: We admire the entrepreneurial spirit! We also feel we are fortunate and would like to help others pursue their goals.
lender.occupational_info: We create small games for internet sites.
